mapper.select: select iw.infoPostNo, iw.userNo, iw.infoPostTitle, iw.agencyName, iw.infoContent, iw.infoOutUrl, iw.infoPostType, iw.deadlineDate, iw.infoArea, iw.perforImg as perforImgName, iw.infoWriteDate, iw.infoUpdateDate, iw.infoImg, u.userName as username from infoWrite iw left join users u on iw.userNo = u.userNo order by iw.infoWriteDate desc, iw.infoPostNo desc limit #{offset}, #{size}

select iw.infoPostNo, iw.userNo, iw.infoPostTitle, iw.agencyName, iw.infoContent, iw.infoOutUrl, iw.infoPostType, iw.deadlineDate, iw.infoArea, iw.perforImg as perforImgName, iw.infoWriteDate, iw.infoUpdateDate, iw.infoImg, u.userName as username from infoWrite iw left join users u on iw.userNo = u.userNo where iw.infoPostNo = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into infoWrite ( userNo, infoPostTitle, agencyName, infoContent, infoOutUrl, infoPostType, deadlineDate, infoArea, infoImg, infoWriteDate, infoUpdateDate ) values ( #{userNo}, #{infoPostTitle}, #{agencyName}, #{infoContent}, #{infoOutUrl}, #{infoPostType}, #{deadlineDate}, #{infoArea}, #{infoImg}, now(), now() )
